songs.title: Kill Dem (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mek we get mad to bloodclaat!!!
All a di people who waan hear one big bumboclaat tune now go so! GO SO! GO SO!
Listen dat tune yah!

[Busta Rhymes]
Heh! A KILL DEM!!!! Remix, Busta Bus!  KILL DEM!!!! Remix, Mavado!
KILL DEM!!!! Remix, Bounty Killer!

[Verse One: Busta Rhymes]
Wah gwaan! Big Bus Rhymes inna di place, big gun still inna mi waist (Yeah!)
We don't like when man stand up and a crowd up mi space, cutlass dig inna yuh face (CHO!)
See di way mi come a bring anodda classic, come through gunman a rinse every ratchet
Bloodclaat mad, as I return wid di remix wid di Warlord and di Gully God (YEAH!)
Mek sure yuh have mi money inna di brown bag (GWAAN) Fuck wid mi money if yuh tink seh oonu bad
Mi have somethin fi yuh and yuh know seh yuh nuh used to
Send gal ova and stand up and shoot yuh (HEH HEH HEH!!)
Well, look how di whole a we a run when mi deh bout inna di place oonu fi know dance DUN
Glad fi see di way di people dem a have fun but mi nah go nowhere and leff mi racthet dem a come

[Hook: Busta Rhymes] (*Pharrell) (Tosh)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (What di bloodclaat dem a talk bout!) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (*Look at that muffin!)
(Dem a know seh we run this bloodclaat round here!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (Weh dem a really a deal wid?) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (Yuh nuh know seh a we run this bumbohole!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (YAH HEAR MI!!!!!!!!!)

[Verse Two: Mavado]
It's just mi!!!! My girl and my fuckin gun!
Yeah! Dem a be on di fuckin run!
I don't really give a fuck, unda di moon or di sun
Pussyhole betta tek wey dem bloodclaat self when di hear God a step pon di ground
Shots fly through head, more than flesh see, dat raw like cup widout dressin
Pussyhole should a know seh mi up until, mi get a bloodclaat blessin
Even when dem dead, mi keep pressin, mi pressin dem stressin blood leff him
How di fuck, dem fi rise dem forgot when di dogs dem don't waan nuh vet in
Gunshot dem fi get, dat dem gettin, it's easy, I ain't sweatin
Bwoy, even a tabernacle pon di hill, Killer gun dem go check in

[Hook: Busta Rhymes] (**Bount Killer)  (*Pharrell) (Tosh)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (What di bloodclaat dem a talk bout!) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (*Look at that muffin!)
(Dem a know seh we run this bloodclaat round here!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (Weh dem a really a deal wid?) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (Yuh nuh know seh a we run this bumbohole!)
(**RELAX!!!! BOOM!!!!)

[Verse Three: Bounty Killer}
Alliance di meanest, war extremest, ain't neva dreamed this, or even seened this
Chalk round body and it a murder scene this kill bwoy di cleanest bwoy weh move leanish
Chat and dem a bitch like seh dem a tek penis, Flipmode, Gully, Alliance a di team this
People dead and this time mi mean it, run up inna mi gun and di whole clip mi gi him it
But Killer head hot, hotta than a oven, hotta and bun up like a pot on a stove, and
Some a map, dem a map, and a hop dem a hop, But I are di one who's chosen
Well!!! Killer war dem a use to, shoot up di car wid di rum and di boots too
Bwoy yuh a nyam gal cherry and a bum like berry and a suck pussyhole man a go shoot yuh

[Hook: Busta Rhymes] (*Pharrell) (Tosh)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
A KILL DEM!!! (And one and two and three and four lick a shot more fire!!!!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (What di bloodclaat dem a talk bout!) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (*Look at that muffin!)
(Dem a know seh we run this bloodclaat round here!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (Weh dem a really a deal wid?) (*Look at that muffin!)
A KILL DEM!!! (*Look at that muffin!) (Yuh nuh know seh a we run this bumbohole!)
(*Look at that muffin!) (YAH HEAR MI!!!!!!!!!)
